com.philips.lighting.hue.sdk

Interface PHSDKListener


  • public interface PHSDKListener
    This interface notifies SDK events towards application.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAccessPointsFound(java.util.List<PHAccessPoint> accessPoints)
      This method reports discovered access points.
      void onAuthenticationRequired(PHAccessPoint accessPoint)
      Callback method for push linking an access point.
      void onBridgeConnected(com.philips.lighting.model.PHBridge bridge)
      Called on successful connection to an access point.
      void onCacheUpdated(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> cacheNotificationsList, com.philips.lighting.model.PHBridge bridge)
      This method is called when the SDK cache corresponding to bridge is updated.
      void onConnectionLost(PHAccessPoint accessPoints)
      Called when the connection to bridge is lost.
      void onConnectionResumed(com.philips.lighting.model.PHBridge bridge)
      Called when the connection to bridge is resumed.
      void onError(int code, java.lang.String message)
      Called when an error occurs during communication with the bridge
      void onParsingErrors(java.util.List<com.philips.lighting.model.PHHueParsingError> parsingErrors)
      Called when one or more parsing errors have occurred while parsing heartbeat.

    • Method Detail

      • onCacheUpdated

        void onCacheUpdated(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> cacheNotificationsList,
                  com.philips.lighting.model.PHBridge bridge)
        This method is called when the SDK cache corresponding to bridge is updated.
        Parameters:
        cacheNotificationsList - is a list containing 1 item for every cache resource that has been updated. All the Integers are PHMessageType (s)
        bridge - the PHBridge object.

      • onBridgeConnected

        void onBridgeConnected(com.philips.lighting.model.PHBridge bridge)
        Called on successful connection to an access point. The access point is now promoted to a Bridge.
        Parameters:
        bridge - the connected PHBridge object.

      • onAuthenticationRequired

        void onAuthenticationRequired(PHAccessPoint accessPoint)
        Callback method for push linking an access point.
        Parameters:
        accessPoint - the PHAccessPoint to connect.

      • onAccessPointsFound

        void onAccessPointsFound(java.util.List<PHAccessPoint> accessPoints)
        This method reports discovered access points.
        Parameters:
        accessPoints - ArrayList of PHAccessPoint objects.

      • onError

        void onError(int code,
           java.lang.String message)
        Called when an error occurs during communication with the bridge
        Parameters:
        code - the error code. The error codes defined in PHMessageType and PHHueError
        message - the error description

      • onConnectionResumed

        void onConnectionResumed(com.philips.lighting.model.PHBridge bridge)
        Called when the connection to bridge is resumed.
        Parameters:
        bridge - the PHBridge object.

      • onConnectionLost

        void onConnectionLost(PHAccessPoint accessPoints)
        Called when the connection to bridge is lost.
        Parameters:
        accessPoints - the PHAccessPoint object.

      • onParsingErrors

        void onParsingErrors(java.util.List<com.philips.lighting.model.PHHueParsingError> parsingErrors)
        Called when one or more parsing errors have occurred while parsing heartbeat.
        Parameters:
        parsingErrors - The list of parsing errors
